section.name: About
section.subsection:
Welcome this is our first XML Template, it’s called AS3 XML Vector Template, it’s fully xml driven. We have put allot of work into it to ensure all your needs are fulfilled. Main Features:
  • fully xml driven (colors, text, opacity, images etc.)
  • clean and simple design,
  • you can simply adjust all the colors to your needs (also the opacity/alpha) through the xml file,
  • it gives you ability to use simple animated menu with subsections,
  • contains 6 different modules (described at the bottom),
  • full screen option,
  • background images,
  • it’s ActionScript 3.0,
  • detailed help file included.
Modules:
  • Home - this module provides the ability to show your users image slide show. The images are loaded in the background and displayed one after another. You can choose between three different type of transitions: fade, slide-right and slide-left. Also the images are scaled to fit the screen.
  • Text - this module gives you ability to display long text, when the text is longer then the section provided for it the scroll up automatically is shown on the side. You can use the html tags in your text. You can easily adjust the color of the text and background.
  • Gallery - this module enables you to create advanced galleries. The images are loading in the background. They are being scaled to the screen so they always fit perfectly. There is a slide show option that can be enabled easily. You can use the controls in the footer to navigate through the gallery or the thumbnails panel on the right.
  • Link - this section enables you redirect user to any url you specify in the xml file.
  • Swf - this module provides ability to load any external swf into your website. For example if you need video player you can just load external video player.
  • Contact - this module enables you to insert a contact form into your website, you can also provide the image that will be displayed in the background.
    • Enjoy!
